title: Blind contour: your hand
prompt: Without looking at your paper, draw your non-dominant hand slowly. Keep your pen on the page the whole time.

title: Gesture: 10-second poses
prompt: Draw 8 stick-figure poses in 10 seconds each. Focus on action, not details.

title: Negative space: chair gaps
prompt: Draw only the empty spaces inside and around a chair. Do not draw the chair itself.

title: Texture study: 5 marks
prompt: Pick one object near you. Create 5 different textures using only line marks (no shading).

title: Value scale with one pencil
prompt: Make a 7-step value scale from white to dark using pressure only.

title: Two-line drawing
prompt: Draw a bicycle (or any complex object) using only TWO continuous lines. No lifting your pen.

title: Silhouette: simple to bold
prompt: Draw 3 silhouettes of the same object: simple, medium detail, bold graphic.

title: Memory drawing: yesterday’s snack
prompt: From memory, draw something you ate yesterday. Add 3 labels for details you remember.

title: Warmup circles
prompt: Fill the page with circles in different sizes. Try to keep them smooth and confident.

title: One-minute still life
prompt: Choose 3 objects. Sketch the big shapes only. No details, no shading.

title: Perspective: box from imagination
prompt: Draw 3 boxes at different angles. Add a horizon line and keep edges consistent.

title: Transform: fish → vehicle
prompt: Start by drawing a fish. Then gradually transform it into a vehicle across 4 small sketches.

title: Contour + cross-contour
prompt: Draw a shoe. Add curved cross-contour lines to show form wrapping around it.

title: Opposite hand challenge
prompt: Draw a simple portrait using your non-dominant hand. Keep it playful and loose.

title: Design: 12 tiny icons
prompt: Create 12 tiny icons for classroom objects (eraser, pencil, ruler, etc.). Keep them simple.

title: Line weight ladder
prompt: Draw 10 straight lines. Start very light and gradually increase line weight each line.

title: 3 angles: the same object
prompt: Pick one object and draw it from 3 different angles. Keep each sketch small.

title: Shadow shapes only
prompt: Draw only the cast shadow shapes of 2 objects. No outlines of the objects.

title: Pairs: mirror drawing
prompt: In pairs: one person draws a simple shape; the other mirrors it across an imaginary line.

title: Whole class: 1-line story chain
prompt: Whole class: each student draws one object, passes it on. Next person adds something that changes the story.

title: Composition: rule of thirds
prompt: Draw a simple scene and place the focal point on a rule-of-thirds intersection.

title: Pattern from nature
prompt: Invent a repeating pattern inspired by leaves, shells, waves, or stones. Fill a small rectangle.

title: Zoom in x3
prompt: Draw an object three times: full view, half zoom, extreme close-up. Focus on shapes.

title: Only triangles
prompt: Draw a face using only triangle shapes. No curves allowed.

title: Speed ellipses
prompt: Draw 20 ellipses at different angles. Try to keep them smooth and aligned.

title: Value: 3-tone poster
prompt: Draw an object using only 3 values: light, mid, dark. No gradients.

title: Perspective: hallway
prompt: Draw a simple hallway using one-point perspective. Add 3 doors or posters.

title: Character from 3 shapes
prompt: Create a character using only 3 base shapes (circle, square, triangle). Add 2 accessories.

title: Sound to line
prompt: Listen to classroom sounds for 30 seconds. Translate them into lines and marks on paper.

title: Object + impossible twist
prompt: Draw a normal object, then add one impossible feature (gravity flip, infinite loop, melting, etc.).
